Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Resurrection and the Holy Fifty Days:

Text.Language: Hiten nip~recbia n~te picalpict/c n~]a~nactacic Mi,a/l p~ar,wn n~naniv/oui: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions of the trumpeter of the Resurrection, Michael the head of the heavenly, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بشفاعات مبوق القيامة ميخائيل رئيس السمائيين. ياربُ أنعم علينا بمغفرة خطايانا.
